Author: SemicolonButterfly
Text: I have deep seated distrust over those cookies after I (years ago) purchased one based on the protein grams listed on the front of the package...and when I got home, realized that was for the whole cookie but there were 2 servings per cookie. I felt heccin bamboozled.
